Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: Jose Raul T Rinon
Reviews.Content: I got a defective product. More than 4 weeks now and still dont have my reimbursement nor a new unit. This is taking so long .

Reviews.Title: I love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Sheily Segovia
Reviews.Content: It is not pink, it is more like a light purple. It works perfectly i have no bad comments i love it!

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: Ivan Ochoa Brito
Reviews.Content: The phone is awesome.But it never said that it only be a few of the language available, and in the few languages wasn't the one I use.So for me that was a big let down, I already bought another galaxy unlocked phone and it was no problem with this, because it was unlocked it had all the available language to install.So that's why a giving just 3 stars to this item.
